After you run the **run_classify_test.R** script (point 4. of the instructions), you will have in this folder four new files: two working files **Unipd-run1_binary.csv**, **Unipd-run2_tfidf.csv**, and the replica of the two official runs **Unipd-run1.csv** and **Unipd-run2.csv**.
